function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inaccurate or malicious survey data impacting the analysis","Impact":"Misleading risk assessment and unreliable results","Mitigation":"Implement data validation checks and verification processes for survey responses","Technologies":"Data validation tools, survey response verification tools","People":"Survey participants, data analysts","Owner":"Data analysts, survey administrators"},{"Description":"Increase in route distance due to avoidance of dangerous areas","Impact":"Increased travel time, fuel consumption, and transportation costs","Mitigation":"Utilize real-time risk assessment data to optimize route planning and minimize detours","Technologies":"Real-time risk assessment tools, route optimization algorithms","People":"Transportation planners, route optimization specialists","Owner":"Transportation planners, logistics companies"},{"Description":"Variability in danger levels of different routes","Impact":"Inconsistent risk exposure for different routes, leading to potential safety hazards","Mitigation":"Develop dynamic risk assessment models that account for real-time changes in danger levels","Technologies":"Dynamic risk assessment algorithms, real-time data integration","People":"Risk analysts, transportation planners","Owner":"Risk analysis teams, transportation agencies"}]}
